spec_data.Name: pangomm-doc
spec_data.Description:
This package contains developer's documentation for the pangomm
library. Pangomm is the C++ API for the Pango font layout library.

The documentation can be viewed either through the devhelp
documentation browser or through a web browser.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 04 Aug 2017 11:39:42 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Developer's documentation for the pangomm library
